strapiPost.title: Walton Arts Center Announces Winter Nights Event Series
strapiPost.content:
Gather with family and friends to enjoy the lights, decor, and cups of cheer during Winter Nights at Walton Arts Center open every Thurs-Sat this December. 

  • Spread cheer: The Joy Pratt Markham Gallery will host games for children and adults, and guests can spread holiday cheer by writing a season greeting to a veteran or retirement home resident.
  • Winter wonderland: The Bradberry Amphitheater & Rose Garden will be open to the public with heaters and seating on a first-come-first-serve basis, and fire pits and snow dome seating can be reserved for groups.

Read more and make reservations HERE.
